metrics_conclusion: Zen Garden - Plants Vs Zombies has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity.
key_conclusion:
Zen Garden - Plants Vs Zombies is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music. 

See the C Major Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
